participant_1.background:
I'm a solitary type and my favorite animal is the cat.
i like watching ufc fights.
i barely show up to work.
I value my memories with my cat more than anything in the world.
My kids are my first priority, so I wake up early to make sure I have time to drive them to their sports events.

participant_2.background:
I am a family person who enjoys watching Netflix in my spare time.
i also like eating sushi.
I am four feet tall, but I am still growing!
i go to school for business.
i am diabetic.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
Pretty good, I'm just watching some Netflix. How about you?
I'm doing well, I just got back from driving my kids to their sports events.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun! Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a cat named Mittens. She's my best friend.
Aww, cats are the best! I'm allergic to them, unfortunately.
Oh, that's too bad. I'm glad you're enjoying Netflix though.
Yeah, it's a great way to relax. What kind of shows do you like to watch?
I like to watch documentaries and action movies. What about you?
I like to watch comedies and dramas. I'm also a big fan of anime.
I've never really watched anime, but I've heard good things about it.
You should give it a try! There are a lot of great shows out there.
I'll have to do that sometime. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! Nice talking to you.
